summary: This module provides Checkov GitLab checks that evaluate security‑related configuration settings. One check inspects a project's merge request approval rules to verify that approvals are required before merging, while the other verifies that groups enforce two‑factor authentication. Both checks parse the relevant GitLab settings and report compliance status against defined policies.
business_intent: Help organizations enforce GitLab security best practices by automatically detecting missing merge request approval requirements and absent two‑factor authentication enforcement, enabling remediation to meet compliance standards.
